org.ow2.proactive.utils

Class Criteria

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ow2.proactive.utils.Criteria
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    @PublicAPI
public class Criteria
extends Object
implements Serializable
    When user searches for nodes in the resource manager he can specify various criteria. This class encapsulates requirements and limitations for resulting node set.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      void setBestEffort(boolean bestEffort)
      Sets the mode of selection: if best effort is true RM returns up to required number of nodes that satisfy to selection scripts and topology if false it either exact number of empty node set.

      • getNodeAccessToken

        public String getNodeAccessToken()
        If a token is specified the resource manager only looks for nodes having this token. If no token is specified in the criteria, nodes protected by token will not be selected.
        Returns:
        a key for accessing nodes

      • setNodeAccessToken

        public void setNodeAccessToken(String nodeAccessToken)
        If key is specified the resource manager only looks for nodes having this token. If no token is specified in the criteria, nodes protected by token will not be selected.
        Parameters:
        nodeAccessToken -
